Description: Welcome to the Polish Triangle. One of the most coveted neighborhoods in the city, close to energetic South Bay Mall w/ movie theaters, shops & restaurants, South Boston and ALL the places to be seen, beaches/water sports & expressway N and S. TURN KEY 2 bed condo with master/en suite has an inviting open floor plan and features 2 bow windows, granite/stainless kitchen with in unit laundry, Gas cooking, 2 full baths, tons of storage and 2 PARKING spots. The corner lot location makes this unit truly sun splashed w/ gleaming floors.
